name: Writer's Soul
description:
You are thrown into the intimacy of a writer who lived and write a hundred years ago. 

At night, in his writing room, you think and you read the poems, the novels, the letters that bring you there : Writing.  

This WebXR experience is the Preface of the upcoming Steam VR Game "The Writing Room" taking the player in a multitude of different intimacies, reading & writing.
